headerDisplay: The **SwitchBot** plugin allows you to control SwitchBot Devices. To get started link your SwitchBot account. 1. Download SwitchBot App on App Store or Google Play Store. 2. Register a SwitchBot account and log in into your account. 3. Generate an Open Token within the App. 4. Input your `Open Token` into the parameter below.
footerDisplay:
Please raise any issues on our [project page](https://github.com/OpenWonderLabs/homebridge-switchbot/issues).

If you would like to have other SwitchBot Devices added to this plugin fill out [Feature Request Form](https://github.com/OpenWonderLabs/homebridge-switchbot/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=feature_request.md).

[SwitchBot Website](https://www.switch-bot.com)

notice.title: Notice
notice.default: Keep your Token & Secret a secret!

hide_device.title: Hide Device
hide_device.description: If true, device will be removed or hidden from HomeKit.

connectionType.title: Connection Type
connectionType.description: Bluetooth (BLE) API is only available for the following Device Types: Humidifier, Meter, MeterPlus, Curtain, Bot, Motion Sensor, Contact Sensor, Plug Mini (US), Plug Mini (JP), & Color Bulb

scanDuration.title: Scan Duration (Default is 1 Second) for BLE

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Press Mode presses one time per 'On' state in the Home App/API. Switch Mode allows you to set how many presses occur when the device is set to 'On'. Multi-Press allows you to queue up multiple button presses. It creates a queue by counting each time the device is set to 'On'. It is most useful for scripting with cURL requests or other API calls. Multi-Press only works when using OpenAPI.

deviceType.title: What Type of Device do you want to display in the Home App?

oneOf.title: Stateful Programmable Switch (Only Works in 3rd Party Home Apps)

allowPush.title: Allow Changes to Be Pushed
allowPush.description: If set to true, this will allow commands to be sent even if device state is already in state that is being pushed.

doublePress.title: How many presses do you want to simulate?

pushRatePress.title: Double Press Push Rate
pushRatePress.description: Indicates the number of seconds between pushes for double presses to SwitchBot API

convertUnitTo.title: Convert Indoor/Outdoor Sensor's Temperature Unit To

dry.title: Water Detector's Dry Alert
dry.description: If true, the Water Detector will send an alert when it is dry.

set_minStep.title: Set Minimum Step
set_minStep.description: Sets the minimum steps that curtain allows. So if set to 20, it would allow you to set the curtain state to 0, 20, 40, 60, 80, and 100

set_min.title: Set Minimum Open State
set_min.description: Sets the minimum percentage before needed to set Curtain to Open

set_max.title: Set Maximum Close State
set_max.description: Sets the maximum percentage before needing to set Curtain to Closed

updateRate.title: Curtain Update Rate
updateRate.description: Indicates the number of seconds before refreshing Curtain status while updating slide progress.

mode.title: Mapping Mode
mode.description: Defines how the Home app sliders control the blind tilt.

set_minStep.title: Set Minimum Step
set_minStep.description: Sets the minimum steps that blind tilt allows. So if set to 20, it would allow you to set the blind tilt state to 0, 20, 40, 60, 80, and 100

set_min.title: Set Minimum Open State
set_min.description: Sets the minimum percentage before needed to set Blind Tilt to Open

set_max.title: Set Maximum Close State
set_max.description: Sets the maximum percentage before needing to set Blind Tilt to Closed

updateRate.title: Blind Tilt Update Rate
updateRate.description: Indicates the number of seconds before refreshing Blind Tilt status while updating slide progress.

silentModeSwitch.title: Enable Blind Tilt Silent Mode Switches

adaptiveLightingShift.title: Adaptive Lighting Shift
adaptiveLightingShift.description: The mired for each Adaptive Lighting update will be increased by this value, making the light appear warmer. Set to -1 to remove Adaptive Lighting feature. Must be -1 or more.

adaptiveLightingShift.title: Adaptive Lighting Shift
adaptiveLightingShift.description: The mired for each Adaptive Lighting update will be increased by this value, making the light appear warmer. Set to -1 to remove Adaptive Lighting feature. Must be -1 or more.

delayBetweenRetries.title: Device Delay Between Retries for OpenAPI (In Seconds)

condition.functionBody: return (model.options && model.options.devices && !model.options.devices[arrayIndices].hide_device && model.options.devices[arrayIndices].deviceId && (model.options.devices[arrayIndices].connectionType === 'BLE' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].connectionType === 'BLE/OpenAPI') && (model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Bot' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Robot Vacuum Cleaner S1' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Robot Vacuum Cleaner S1 Plus' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Strip Light' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Plug' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Plug Mini (JP)' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Plug Mini (US)' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Curtain' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Curtain3' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Color Bulb' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Ceiling Light' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Ceiling Light Pro' || model.options.devices[arrayIndices].configDeviceType === 'Motion Sensor'));

hide_device.title: Hide Device
hide_device.description: If true, device will be removed or hidden from HomeKit.

connectionType.title: Connection Type
connectionType.description: Enables OpenAPI, if disabled will leave device in HomeKit and commands will not be sent to OpenAPI.

commandType.title: Command Type
commandType.description: Customize your command type, Default: command

disablePushDetail.title: Disable Sending Detail Command(s)
disablePushDetail.description: Details would be like tempearture for Air Conditioners.

hide_automode.title: Hide Auto Mode on IR Air Conditioners

set_max_heat.title: IR Air Conditioner Maximum Heat Range
set_max_heat.description: Set the maximum heat range for the IR Air Conditioner.

set_min_heat.title: IR Air Conditioner Minimum Heat Range
set_min_heat.description: Set the minimum heat range for the IR Air Conditioner.

set_max_cool.title: IR Air Conditioner Maximum Cool Range
set_max_cool.description: Set the maximum cool range for the IR Air Conditioner.

set_min_cool.title: IR Air Conditioner Minimum Cool Range
set_min_cool.description: Set the minimum cool range for the IR Air Conditioner.

meterType.title: Use an existing Switchbot device for temperature/humidity

meterId.title: Device ID of the device to use for temperature/humidity

deviceType.title: What Type of Device do you want to display in the Home App?

oneOf.title: Stateful Programmable Switch (Only Works in 3rd Party Home Apps)

delayBetweenRetries.title: Delay Between Retries for OpenAPI (In Seconds)

allowInvalidCharacters.title: Allow Invalid Characters
allowInvalidCharacters.description: If true, invalid characters will be allowed in the device name.

items.description: Specifies the interval, in seconds, for retrieving the latest device status from the SwitchBot API. This interval applies only to this specific device.
Specifies the interval, in seconds, at which this device will request updates from the SwitchBot API while the device is in motion, for Curtain(s) and Blind Tilt(s) only.
Specifies the interval, in seconds, between pushes to the SwitchBot API for this specific device.
Specifies the interval, in seconds, for retrieving the latest device status from the SwitchBot API.
Specifies the interval, in seconds, at which devices will request updates from the SwitchBot API while in motion, for Curtain(s) and Blind Tilt(s) only.
Specifies the interval, in seconds, between pushes to the SwitchBot API.
